DataElement.preferredName: Minimal Residual Disease Day 8 Induction Therapy Status Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Minimum residual disease status by flow cytometry, in blood, day 8.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Minimal Residual Disease Day 8 Induction Therapy Blood Status
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: remainder of a tumor or a neoplasm/cancer after primary, potentially curative therapy._The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours._A number with no fractional part.::8_Treatment designed to be used as a first step toward shrinking the cancer and in evaluating response to drugs and other agents. Induction therapy is followed by additional therapy to eliminate whatever cancer remains._A liquid tissue; its major function is to transport oxygen throughout the body. It also supplies the tissues with nutrients, removes waste products, and contains various components of the immune system defending the body against infection. Several hormones also travel in the blood._A condition or state at a particular time.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: remainder of a tumor or a neoplasm/cancer after primary, potentially curative therapy.

Concepts.definition: Evidence for remaining tumor following primary treatment that is only apparent using highly sensitive techniques.

Property.preferredName: Day Integer::8 Neoadjuvant Therapy Blood Status
Property.preferredDefinition: The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours.:A number with no fractional part.::8:Treatment designed to be used as a first step toward shrinking the cancer and in evaluating response to drugs and other agents. Induction therapy is followed by additional therapy to eliminate whatever cancer remains.:Blood circulating throughout the body.:A condition or state at a particular time.

Concepts.definition: The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
Therapy administered prior to the primary treatment for the purpose of making the primary treatment more effective.

A liquid tissue; its major function is to transport oxygen throughout the body. It also supplies the tissues with nutrients, removes waste products, and contains various components of the immune system defending the body against infection. Several hormones also travel in the blood.
A condition or state at a particular time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results or effects (does not include CTC Adverse Events) of therapeutic agents or procedures administered to the patient.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Released per approval of TARGET AL team via email on 5/25/11. mc

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to capture a list of findings following an examination or observation.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A finding of abnormality following an examination or observation confirming something, such as the presence of a disease, condition, or microorganism.

Concepts.definition: A finding of abnormality following an examination or observation confirming something, such as the presence of a disease, condition, or microorganism.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A finding of normality following an examination or investigation looking for the presence of a microorganism, disease, or condition.

Concepts.definition: A finding of normality following an examination or investigation looking for the presence of a microorganism, disease, or condition.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not yet decided or settled; awaiting conclusion or confirmation.

Concepts.definition: Not yet decided or settled; awaiting conclusion or confirmation.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Updated VM Short Name to be the Public ID to be consistent with current convention for VM Short Name - DW 10-03-2022

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Data from an original source is not present, accessible or ready for use or service.

Concepts.definition: Data from an original source is not present, accessible or ready for use or service.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Indicates that a test was not performed.

Concepts.definition: Indicates that a test was not performed.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Positive Finding Negative Finding Unknown Finding Type
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A finding of abnormality following an examination or observation confirming something, such as the presence of a disease, condition, or microorganism.:A finding of normality following an examination or investigation looking for the presence of a microorganism, disease, or condition.:Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.:Clinical, laboratory or molecular evidence, or absence of evidence of disease.:Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

Concepts.definition: A finding of abnormality following an examination or observation confirming something, such as the presence of a disease, condition, or microorganism.
A finding of normality following an examination or investigation looking for the presence of a microorganism, disease, or condition.
Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.
Clinical, laboratory or molecular evidence, or absence of evidence of disease.
Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.
